pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Genular' Database API // Provides an interface to the 'Genular' database API (https://genular.atomic-lab.org), allowing efficient retrieval and integration of genomic, proteomic, and single-cell data. It supports operations like fetching gene annotations, cell expression profiles, and other information as defined in the 'Genular' database, enabling seamless incorporation of biological data into R workflows. With functions tailored for bioinformatics and machine learning, the package facilitates exploration of cellular heterogeneity, gene-disease relationships, and pathway analysis, streamlining multi-omics data analysis.
